Expression.markdownDescription:
Expression with rule conditions

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 4  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^[><0-9A-Za-z_.,:)(!= ]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

SubstitutionValue.description: A key-value pair to associate expression's substitution variable names with their values

ValueReference.markdownDescription:
Variable name

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 2  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^:[A-Za-z0-9_]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

A key-value pair to associate expression's substitution variable names with their values

Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No

ThresholdType.markdownDescription:
Threshold type for a rule

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL | LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL | GREATER_THAN | LESS_THAN  
Update requires: No interruption

ThresholdUnit.markdownDescription:
Threshold unit for a rule

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: COUNT | PERCENTAGE  
Update requires: No interruption
